list.cn: 我可以问一下你的年龄吗?

list.en: May I ask how old you are?
list.cn: 我可以问一下你多大了吗?

list.en: You're not forty yet, are you?
We are of the same age.
I'm five years older than you are.
I was thirty on my last birthday.
list.cn: 我上一个生日是三十岁。

list.en: I'm going to be 27 next sunday.
You are not old enough to smoke.
I can't drive a car yet.
He is too old to go out for a walk.
list.cn: 他太老了，不能出去散步了。

list.en: His legs are too long for his inches.
list.cn: 就他的身高而言，他的腿太长。

list.en: She stands out in the crowd for she is two meters in height.
list.cn: 她在人群中很显眼，因为她身高两米。

list.en: Her weight went down to a satisfactory level.
list.cn: 她的体重降到了令人满意的水平。

list.en: During her illness her weight went down from fifty kilos to forty kilos.
list.cn: 她生病期间体重从五十公斤下降到四十公斤。

list.en: I never care about my weight.
Do you worry about your weight?
She is so slender and slim but curvy.
list.cn: 她是如此苗条，但曲线优美。

list.en: Her skin is white as snow.
Your skin is dark but healthy.
list.cn: 你的皮肤很黑，但很健康。

list.en: She had the most beautiful blue eyes I had ever seen.
list.cn: 她有一双我所见过的最美丽的蓝眼睛。

list.en: She has a very pleasant smile and she always has a twinkle in her eye.
list.cn: 她有一个非常愉快的微笑，她的眼睛里总是闪烁着光芒。

list.en: When he laughs, we see his even teeth.
list.cn: 当他笑的时候，我们看到他整齐的牙齿。

list.en: When she smiled, she showed her white, even teeth.
list.cn: 当她微笑时，露出了洁白整齐的牙齿。

list.en: She is a girl with long straight hair.
list.cn: 她是一个留着长直发的女孩。

list.en: Her hair is brown and curly.
list.cn: 她的头发是棕色的，卷曲的。

list.en: He has no hair on the top of his head.
I have had my hair cut and permed.
Why are you always full of energy?
list.cn: 你为什么总是精力充沛?

list.en: Your brother is really a man of the world.
list.cn: 你哥哥真是个见多识广的人。

list.en: I'm willing to learn and progress.
I have a strong determination to succeed.
He is mature, dynamic and honest.
He is willing to work under pressure with leadership quality.
list.cn: 他愿意在压力下工作，并具有领导素质。

list.en: He has the ability to deal with personnel at all levels effectively.
list.cn: 他有能力有效地与各级人员打交道。

list.en: He is a man with good analytical capability.
list.cn: 他是一个分析能力很强的人。

list.en: She is a girl with a pleasant, mature attitude.
list.cn: 她是一个态度开朗、成熟的女孩。

list.en: She is elegant with nice personality.
He is a very stingy person.
list.cn: 他是一个非常吝啬的人。

list.en: He always smites with a tongue.
She would find every opportunity to stab in the back of others.
list.cn: 她会找一切机会在别人背后捅刀子。

list.en: She always has an axe to grind.
The old woman doesn't have her heart in the right place.
list.cn: 这个老妇人的心肠不太好。

list.en: She always speaks with her tongue in her cheek.
He always goes back on his words.
She's the one that would bite the hand that feeds her.
list.cn: 她是那种恩将仇报的人。

list.en: The old man's action is quite weird.
list.cn: 这位老人的行为相当怪异。

list.en: He has a bad mood, she selfish.
